attributes.action: Those Elected to be Police Commissioners
attributes.additional_details:
We now have Elected Police Commissioners. They have been appointed & for instance the new Police Commissioner is taking on OLD POLICE AUTHORITY MEMBERS to do his  new job. This is yet another "POLITICAL INDEPENDANCE ISSUE A  STEP TO FAR.  Politics & the Police do not mix.
WE NOW NEED  TO STAND UP & BE COUNTED FOR "POLICE INDEPENDANCE".

Register your independance & request a debate in the Commons on this subject.
